review:
Shalini ma'am was nothing short of a friend through our entire journey towards being parents. 

She was patient, cooperative and helpful through out. No matter what time we reached out to her, she always made sure to answer. We underwent IUI and she explained everything in detail and with such an ease, that we never felt any hesitation. She was always around. And the best part, she was always upfront about everything, which was refreshing and reassuring.

Her treatment made us proud parents of a beautiful baby boy. I do owe it to her for all her efforts and patience. She has been nothing short of a miracle for us. 

Thank you ma'am for everything you did for us and thank you for being there with us, throughout the journey.

It was our second attempt for IUI treatment and we were nervous as our first attempt we had a very bad experience....we got lucky and got in touch with Dr Shalini and she turned out to be not just the best doctor you could ask for but an amazing human being and the way she made my wife comfortable was an awesome experience... Throughout the process she helped with the meds and scans and in her first attempt only we were blessed with a baby girl....She has God's hand and throughout my life I will be thankful to you Mam....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
As per doctor shalini suggestion my wife got conceived with in two to three months ** *** ******* **** *** not only she treated but she helped us lot about know about awareness about sexual disease other hormonal imbalances and more over she is very friendly in nature. 
We are completely followed her treatment and we are happily enjoying our responsibility as becoming parents 

We thank doctor shalini for everything she did in our life 
Madam thanks a lot for providing happiness in our life

review: I met Dr.Shalini mam for infertility treatment and she just made me and my husband comfortable explained us each and everything in just 4months I conceived it was just miracle for me. I want to say she is so positive in nature such a calm person when ever I call her she answers to my questions and solves  the problem. Thank u for everything mam.
